mapper.insert: INSERT INTO actor(actorno, actornameen, actornamekr, birth, nation, actorpic, actorthumb, actorpicsize) VALUES (actor_seq.nextval, #{actornameen}, #{actornamekr}, #{birth}, #{nation}, #{actorpic}, #{actorthumb}, #{actorpicsize})
mapper.select: SELECT actorno, actornameen, actornamekr, birth, nation, actorpic, actorthumb, actorpicsize FROM actor ORDER BY actorno

SELECT DISTINCT actornameen, actornamekr, actorno FROM actor WHERE upper(actornameen) LIKE '%' || upper(#{search_dir}) || '%' OR actornamekr LIKE '%' || upper(#{search_dir}) || '%' AND ROWID IN (SELECT MAX(ROWID) FROM actor GROUP BY actorno)

SELECT COUNT (actorno) as cnt FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT a.actorno FROM actor a, film f, cast c WHERE UPPER (a.actornameen) LIKE UPPER ( '%' || #{search_actor} || '%') OR a.actornamekr LIKE '%' || #{search_actor} || '%' OR a.nation LIKE '%' || #{search_actor} || '%' OR c.role LIKE '%' || #{search_actor} || '%' OR f.titleen LIKE '%' || #{search_actor} || '%' OR f.titlekr LIKE '%' || #{search_actor} || '%' )

SELECT actorno FROM ( SELECT actorno, rownum as r FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT a.actorno FROM actor a, film f, cast c WHERE UPPER (a.actornameen) LIKE UPPER ( '%' || #{search_actor} || '%') OR a.actornamekr LIKE '%' || #{search_actor} || '%' OR a.nation LIKE '%' || #{search_actor} || '%' OR c.role LIKE '%' || #{search_actor} || '%' OR f.titleen LIKE '%' || #{search_actor} || '%' OR f.titlekr LIKE '%' || #{search_actor} || '%' ORDER BY actorno ) ) WHERE r >= #{startNum, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND r <= #{endNum, jdbcType=INTEGER}
